successes.title: TLC is BACK to make our FINAL ALBUM with YOU!
successes.description: We wouldn’t dream of making our final album with anyone BUT our fans. Come on y'all, BE A PART OF TLC HISTORY!

Pledges.description: KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE REMIX.

Thank you so much for backing our project! Welcome to the TLC family :) For $5, you will get behind the scenes updates about the album, PLUS you will get to vote for which TLC track you want REMIXED for the final album!!!
TLC INSPO.
You’ll get a PDF of a handwritten list of our top 15 favorite songs of all time. Maybe our list will offer you some inspo! And you know we'll be including our Kickstarter exclusive remix, too!
THE DIGITAL ALBUM.
We can’t wait for you to hear our FINAL ALBUM! For your pledge, you will get a digital download of the album!! Plus, you'll get our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!
KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT

You get everything above, plus a TLC t-shirt, designed exclusively for this campaign. This t-shirt will not be sold at any other time in history, so snag some exclusive swag while you still can! Plus the digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix! Design mockup available in Update #10.
FANMAIL FOREVER.

Remember when we included a booklet in "Fanmail" giving shout outs to thousands of fans?! We're bringing it back by including YOUR NAME in our digital album booklet and on our website. Plus, the digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!
DANCE SCHOOL.

Even Michael Jackson had our TLC dances memorized! Now you can learn our favorite TLC DANCE MOVES in our video tutorial! Plus,  fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!
A SIGNED CD OF OUR FINAL ALBUM!

We are BLOWN AWAY by all the requests for a physical CD of our final album. Your wish is our command! We will also SIGN your CD to make each one even more special for all our amazing fans! Plus, dance school, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!
This reward is not included in any other tiers.
TLC SCRAPBOOK.

Throwback love!!!! Because we love memories, we put together a digital book with old photos, private letters, hair and makeup tutorials...and a few more TLC gems just for you. Plus, dance school, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!
SIGNED VINYL BABY.

You know the best way to hear music is on vinyl! So dust off those record players and hear our final album with that TLC sound! We'll sign it just for you! Plus, TLC scrapbook, dance school, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!
TLC HITS ON VINYL WITH KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE ARTWORK (SIGNED!!)

We heard y’all asking for more vinyl and we thought, “Hmm. What can we do that’s special?” So we are making an EXCLUSIVE vinyl with five of our greatest hits and limited edition artwork just for our Kickstarter backers. Plus, TLC scrapbook, dance school, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!
This reward is not included in any other tiers.
Gold VIP Package

The GOLD VIP Package includes a Meet & Greet with a #TLCselfie, a VIP laminate badge and an exclusive poster, signed by TLC!! Does not include a VIP ticket. You’ll also receive a special gift to make sure you have a Crazy Sexy Cool time! Plus the TLC digital scrapbook, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!

You MUST purchase your own tickets to the show in order to participate in the Gold VIP Package. Concert ticket, travel and accommodations not included. This reward is available for all cities and dates on our upcoming tour, which are subject to change.
Gold VIP Package

The GOLD VIP Package includes a Meet & Greet with a #TLCselfie, a VIP laminate badge and an exclusive poster, signed by TLC!! Does not include a VIP ticket. You’ll also receive a special gift to make sure you have a Crazy Sexy Cool time! Plus the TLC digital scrapbook, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!

You MUST purchase your own tickets to the show in order to participate in the Gold VIP Package. Concert ticket, travel and accommodations not included. This reward is available for all cities and dates on our upcoming tour, which are subject to change.
VOICEMAIL BY TLC.

Long live the voicemail!! TLC will record your outgoing voicemail message, customized just for YOU ;) Plus, the vinyl, TLC scrapbook, dance school, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!
Platinum VIP Package

The Platinum VIP package includes a Meet & Greet with TLC in the dressing room before the show. Does not include a VIP ticket. You’ll enjoy a #TLCselfie, a shoutout to your Facebook/Twitter page from us, a VIP laminate badge, a VIP TLC Tshirt and an exclusive poster, signed by TLC!! Does not include a VIP ticket. You’ll also receive a special gift to make sure you have a Crazy Sexy Cool time! Plus the TLC digital scrapbook, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!

You MUST purchase tickets your own tickets to the show in order to participate in the Platinum VIP Package. Concert ticket, travel and accommodations not included. This reward is available for all cities and dates on our upcoming tour, which are subject to change.
Platinum VIP Package

The Platinum VIP package includes a Meet & Greet with TLC in the dressing room before the show. Does not include a VIP ticket. You’ll enjoy a #TLCselfie, a shoutout to your Facebook/Twitter page from us, a VIP laminate badge, a VIP TLC Tshirt and an exclusive poster, signed by TLC!! Does not include a VIP ticket. You’ll also receive a special gift to make sure you have a Crazy Sexy Cool time! Plus the TLC digital scrapbook, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!

You MUST purchase tickets your own tickets to the show in order to participate in the Platinum VIP Package. Concert ticket, travel and accommodations not included. This reward is available for all cities and dates on our upcoming tour, which are subject to change.
FAN CALLS.

TLC IS ON THE LINE. Yeahhh! We will CALL YOU PERSONALLY. We can’t wait to speak with you! Plus, the vinyl, TLC scrapbook, dance school, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!
VIDEO CHAT.

Let's hang out in a video session complete with a serenade and SO MANY laughs. We can’t wait!  Plus, the vinyl, TLC scrapbook, dance school, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!
AUTOGRAPHED LYRICS.

Get handwritten and autographed lyrics for UNPRETTY with a special thank you note! Plus, the vinyl, TLC scrapbook, dance school, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!
AUTOGRAPHED LYRICS – NO SCRUBS.

Get handwritten and autographed lyrics for NO SCRUBS with a special thank you note! Plus, the vinyl, TLC scrapbook, dance school, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!
AUTOGRAPHED LYRICS – WATERFALLS.

Get handwritten and autographed lyrics for WATERFALLS with a special thank you note! Plus, the vinyl, TLC scrapbook, dance school, fanmail, digital album, our list of favorite songs and Kickstarter exclusive remix!
